data.oai_dc:dc: Data features: - The original questionnaires that were sent to the English or French-speaking experts for each round of the Delphi procedure. It includes explanations about the research projects and the related concepts, and detailed results of the nominal groups.- All the experts' answers and comments for each round of the Delphi procedure.- A table of the scores for both rounds.For more detailed info on the files included, see "readme" file
